weakness.name: Misconfigured Authentication Method for Administrator Accounts
weakness.desc: The authentication method "Multi-factor Authentication" for the Administrator accounts are not configured

test.steps:
1. Log into the Azure portal as an owner.
  2. Select Azure Active Directory.
  3. Go into "Users and groups" > "All users".
  4. Select "Multi-Factor Authentication".
  5. Check all Administrator accounts have got the MFA flag enabled.
